qas.question: What type of tall buildings are being planned on Southampton's waterfront?
How many stories tall will each of the three proposed towers be?
What marina in Southampton may get a 15-story high hotel?
What factor is very strong in Southampton that encourages redevelopment of the city?
What's the projected budget of the development plan that includes the new hotels?

context: Southampton's strong <a3_0>economy<a3_0/> is promoting redevelopment, and major projects are proposed, including the city's first <a0_0>skyscrapers<a0_0/> on the waterfront. The three towers proposed will stand <a1_0>23<a1_0/> storeys high and will be surrounded by smaller apartment blocks, office blocks and shops. There are also plans for a 15-storey hotel at the <a2_0>Ocean Village<a2_0/> marina, and a 21-storey hotel on the north eastern corner of the city centre, as part of a <a4_0>£100m<a4_0/> development.
